info.name: Revert Tweetdeck changes to tweet actions
info.description: Reverts the recent Tweetdeck changes to the tweet actions (reply/retweet/like) as well as the reverting of "View conversation" to the old icon with a speech bubble.
info.additionalInfo: 4/28/16 - Updated to fix Direct Message actions not being aligned to the left. @AlimonyMindset
